SELECT md."name" AS "deptName", ds."id" AS "deptSubId", ds."name" AS "deptSubName", d."name" AS "doctorName", wp."id" AS "workPlanId", wp."date" AS "date" FROM HOSPITAL.DOCTOR_WORK_PLAN wp JOIN HOSPITAL.DOCTOR d ON wp."doctor_id" = d."id" JOIN HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_DEPT_SUB ds ON ds."id" = wp."dept_sub_id" JOIN HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_DEPT md ON ds."dept_id" = md."id" WHERE wp."date" BETWEEN TO_DATE('${startDate}') AND TO_DATE('${endDate}')
AND ds."dept_id" = ${deptId}
AND d."name" LIKE '%${doctorName}%'
ORDER BY ds."id",wp."date"
SELECT DISTINCT "date" FROM HOSPITAL.DOCTOR_WORK_PLAN WHERE "dept_sub_id" = ${deptSubId} AND "date" BETWEEN TO_DATE('${startDate}') AND TO_DATE('${endDate}')

SELECT d."id" AS "id", d."name" AS "name", d."photo" AS "photo", d."job" AS "job", d."description" AS "description", p."num" AS "num", p."maximum" AS "maximum", TO_CHAR(dp."price_1", '#00.00') AS "price" FROM HOSPITAL.DOCTOR_WORK_PLAN p JOIN HOSPITAL.DOCTOR d ON p."doctor_id" = d."id" JOIN HOSPITAL.DOCTOR_PRICE dp ON p."doctor_id" = dp."doctor_id" WHERE p."dept_sub_id" = ${deptSubId} AND p."date" = TO_DATE('${date}')
